General.Description: Entreprise and Policy are the things make the most concern of man. Factoids or Factom is a special blockchain to businesses and governments. The users can use Factom to simplify records management, record business processes, etc with remarkable applications, including audit systems, medical records, supply chain management, voting systems, property titles, legal applications, and financial systems.
General.Features: FCT was considered as fully approachable for any usersby their techical features. Firstly, everone can find the software tokens on Poloniex and its benefits from this platform. Secondly, the investors have been eagerly awaiting by Factoids trading on crypto-exchanges and it allows new members to purchase some tokens for future use.
General.Technology: Factom put on one blockchain three technologies are a private Factom chain and two public chains, Bitcoin and Ethereum. The Harmony application provides a single permanent document catalogue that is helpful for audits, file reviews, lost documents, post-closing and litigation.
General.Sponsor: Factom started Jan 25, 2014 with the conversation of 2 founders Paul Snow and David Jonston to build the technology that would become Factom. The headquater of Facom are Austin, Texas where support global offices.
